summary: A ragged black Ninja type outfit, with a hood instead of a mask and a 2 handed Ninjato sword with a shiny blade.
descriptionHtml:
ShroudedNight Garb
by stormshallow

This mod was made by request

Location:
	You can find the ShroudedNight Garb in the NightGate Inn not to far from Windhelm, in the \"ShroudedNight Chest\".

Credits:
I (Stormshallow) edited the meshes and retextured the ninja sword
from a ninja short sword from \"Weapons Of The Shogunate 1_02\" by Moraelin

retextured clothing from Skyrim

and retextured boots from “The Witcher 2 Models” by L0rd0fWar

Permission:
Feel free to use this mod for any Skyrim mod that you want, as long as you do not charge any money for it.
author: stormshallow
